name: Enforced Chastity Game (Downloadable)
description:
This game is essentially the same as that described in the following video:

But it has the following additional functions:

Please down the "eval" version first (chastityGameEval.exe for Windows, or chastgameForAndroidEval.apk for Android), and run it to check that it works OK on your device before paying for the full version (although there should be no problems on the vast majority of devices).

THE EVAL VERSIONS ARE RESTRICTED TO A MAXIMUM WAITING TIME OF ONE DAY (unless you specify an explicit waiting time using the "S" cheat key).
